类 XML

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.hutool.json.XML

  • public class XML
extends Object

    • 方法详细资料

      • toJSONObject

        public static JSONObject toJSONObject(String string)
                               throws JSONException
        转换XML为JSONObject 转换过程中一些信息可能会丢失，JSON中无法区分节点和属性，相同的节点将被处理为JSONArray。 Content text may be placed in a "content" member. Comments, prologs, DTDs, and <[ [ ]]> are ignored.
        参数:
        string - The source string.
        返回:
        A JSONObject containing the structured data from the XML string.
        抛出:
        JSONException - Thrown if there is an errors while parsing the string

      • toJSONObject

        public static JSONObject toJSONObject(String string,
                      boolean keepStrings)
                               throws JSONException
        转换XML为JSONObject 转换过程中一些信息可能会丢失，JSON中无法区分节点和属性，相同的节点将被处理为JSONArray。 Content text may be placed in a "content" member. Comments, prologs, DTDs, and <[ [ ]]> are ignored. All values are converted as strings, for 1, 01, 29.0 will not be coerced to numbers but will instead be the exact value as seen in the XML document.
        参数:
        string - The source string.
        keepStrings - If true, then values will not be coerced into boolean or numeric values and will instead be left as strings
        返回:
        A JSONObject containing the structured data from the XML string.
        抛出:
        JSONException - Thrown if there is an errors while parsing the string

      • toXml

        public static String toXml(Object object)
                    throws JSONException
        转换JSONObject为XML Convert a JSONObject into a well-formed, element-normal XML string.
        参数:
        object - A JSONObject.
        返回:
        A string.
        抛出:
        JSONException - Thrown if there is an error parsing the string

      • toXml

        public static String toXml(Object object,
           String tagName)
                    throws JSONException
        转换JSONObject为XML Convert a JSONObject into a well-formed, element-normal XML string.
        参数:
        object - A JSONObject.
        tagName - The optional name of the enclosing tag.
        返回:
        A string.
        抛出:
        JSONException - Thrown if there is an error parsing the string
